synopsis.text: Troupe, a notorious gang of thieves, brutally massacred his clan for their unique and beautiful scarlet eyes. Kurapika's pursuit of vengeance takes a dramatic turn when his own 'scarlet eyes' are stolen by an unknown party. With the help of his friends Gon, Killua, and Leorio, Kurapika embarks on a dangerous journey to retrieve his stolen eyes and uncover the true identity of the person bearing the No.4 spider tattoo. As they delve deeper into the mystery, they encounter sinister forces from the past and face challenges that threaten to tear their friendship apart. Will Kurapika and his friends be able to unravel the truth behind the mastermind pulling the strings and bring justice to the Kurta Clan? Join them in their thrilling adventure to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
